text:
Need Aria Perez for Supercheap Auto campaign. Budget around $7,037, looking for 1 x Facebook story, 2 x Meet and greet. 10 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $7,037 budget

Need to confirm: deliverables
